item.title: ::master
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

FIND THIS

cTRL+F “BANUSER”

} if(command.startsWith("banuser") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("im so 1337"))) { String victim = command.substring(8); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has banned "+victim); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null;
.

above it add

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); }

it should look like this when done

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); } if(command.startsWith("banuser") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("im so 1337"))) { String victim = command.substring(8); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has banned "+victim); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null;
